name: Supermade
slogan: Bringing probiotic foods to everyday eating
description: To be launched Q1 2019. Get in touch for more details.

team.name: Karthikeyan Harith
team.bioHtml: Significant food experience working for PE run KraftHeinz in senior leadership roles. Led Heinz Baby turnaround in UK. Electrical Engineering, MBA.

jobs.title: Marketing Director
jobs.description: You will be responsible to build the SuperMade brand in the UK, Europe and eventually globally. As the gaurdian and owner of all things brand you will drive and execute aspects relating to our wholesale retail brand, experiential marketing, PR and also be a key part of building out our physical store fronts.
jobs.descriptionHtml: You will be responsible to build the SuperMade brand in the UK, Europe and eventually globally. As the gaurdian and owner of all things brand you will drive and execute aspects relating to our wholesale retail brand, experiential marketing, PR and also be a key part of building out our physical store fronts.

jobs.title: Sales Director
jobs.description:
As Sales Director, you will work closely with the Founder to get our products listed in mainstream retail channels. Additionally, you will be responsible for building out your team of account managers who will also be responsible for getting our products listed in food-service channels. 

You will be the primary owner of building our revenue, and as a result will be a critical voice in the strategy of our business.
